txt.en: 'Let us cross the bridge, and remain vigilant! The forces of Angmar crept back into the city while we were in the South-lands, and they may seek to surprise us.'

'The badge has been cleansed of its corruption? We have made proud whatever forgotten warden wore this badge in defence of his king, [placeholder]!

'I have thought of something as well. The guards of the city in days of old wore these badges to signify their posts, but I am grateful that we have not maintained that tradition. If the Steadfast Sisters were consigned to their own posts, they would not have come here to Ariant when they did, and Olcránnag might have escaped to work further evil. Truthfully, there is no man save Elessar alone who might be able to command the Sisters and have them heed it, but still I am glad that wardens and Rangers go where they are needed, not where they are assigned to be.

'Where next will you go? To Rivendell, to speak with Elrond? Give him my regards, for I must stay here and hold the line against Angmar.'
'Safe journey to Rivendell, my friend.'
The Badge of Ariant has been cleansed of Mordor's corruption!
'You're not going anywhere.'
You have come with Techeron to the Bridge of Ariant with the hope that the corrupted badge might be cleansed of its evil.
'I had a feeling we might be needed.'
'Have you come to swear allegiance to Angmar?'
The Ranger Techeron is at the Bridge of Ariant, in Annúminas.
'I sense that you bear a powerful artifact of evil!'
'My servants! Slay the trespassers!'
DNT - Blah!
'Incompetents!'
The Ranger Techeron is near the Bridge of Ariant.
'There are only two of them!'
'Elendil's wardens are all dead.'
Fight alongside Techeron and restore the Badge of Ariant
'Now you will go to join them!'
'Then die, die, die!'
Talk to Techeron
'But it will be our pleasure to rid this city of you!'
'Each of us is worth ten of your thralls, Olcránnag!'
'That was true of he who wore this badge, as well!'
'Careful, he attacks!'
'The oath I swore bound me to go to Aragorn when he had need.'
'No, he seeks to escape!'
'I do not regret the journey of the Grey Company!'
'I am glad to see you three!'
'But we did not leave enough defenders behind.'
'Angmar, defeated once, sought to rise again.'
'Forces from Carn Dûm hold Ost Elendil even now.'
'Why have they not secured the bridge?'
Talk to Techeron at the Bridge of Ariant
'Steady, [placeholder]. A villain reveals himself.'
Línneth
'Prepare for disappointment, vile one.'
'We are here to cleanse this badge of its corruption.'
Gwíniel
Techeron has been defeated!
Instance: Heirloom of the High King
